title: EXT e-Storia promises high-end coil shock performance specifically for eMTB
content:
Extreme Shox have released an eMTB-specific coil shock. More than simply an overbuilt version of the Storia V3, the EXT e-Storia is engineered to withstand the additional weight and forces associated with eMTB, with a number of key upgrades to the chassis and damping system to improve reliability. Here’s the tech breakdown. EXT e-Storia Extreme […]

The post EXT e-Storia promises high-end coil shock performance specifically for eMTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
